pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Eva Elise vom Baur Hansl Papers, 1939-1954
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes scripts of Women in the Making of America, 1939-1940, broadcast in cooperation with the WPA's Federal Theatre Radio Division, and Gallery of Women, a series produced by the University of Michigan, 1954, and broadcast in cooperation with the U.S. Office of Education. Also includes program outlines, posters and clippings.
